overview: Jasper is founder and CEO of oneDrum, a platform which converts existing desktop applications into rich collaborative environments. Previously, Jasper was VP of Professional Services at Enigmatec and a member of the founding team. At Enigmatec he was responsible for developing workflow automation tools and managing virtual computing environments for large organisations including Deutsche Bank, Carphone Warehouse and Unisys. Before entering the start-up world, Jasper was a software engineer at Swiss Bank (later UBS) and Instinet (formerly owned by Reuters). Jasper has a BA in Philosophy from Kings College London, and an MSc in Cognitive Science from Manchester University. He is passionate about realising the Internetâ€™s potential for true collaboration and enabling smarter working.
